import React from 'react' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import PropTypes from 'prop-types' const CommentItem = props => { const { postId } = props const { _id, text, name, avatar, user, date } = props.comment const { auth } = props return (

{name}

{text}

Posted on 04/16/2019

) } CommentItem.propTypes = { postId: PropTypes.number.isRequired, comment: PropTypes.object.isRequired, auth: PropTypes.object.isRequired, } export default CommentItem
